title: docOPD - Diagnosis to Cure
description:
docOPD - Family Doctor Telehealth Consultation

docOPD offers you telehealth consultation from a family doctor - Quick & Convenient to get advice and prescription on docOPD Mobile App.  Unlike regular teleconsultation where you are unsure to see the same doctor again, docOPD offers you the freedom to select your own favorite family physician whom you can consult again and again for future health illnesses or health advice.

Your family doctor is familiar to you and knows your family's health history. He may understand your health requirements. Family Doctor teleconsultation improves good health practice by offering great convenience to access family doctors during odd times or locations when you in the utmost need to speak to a doctor. This is simple, convenient, and affordable.

OPD Health Plans
Choose OPD Health Plans which best fit you and your family requirements & save on Out of the Pocket Medical Expenses such as OPD Consultation, Medicines & Lab Tests. docOPD offers you integrated health and wellness benefits under various plans such as silver, gold or platinum, offering a bundle of health benefits such as,
• Tele Consultation from Family Doctor (Private & Secure TeleHealth)
• Tele Consultation from  Specialist & Super Specialist (Private & Secure TeleHealth)
• Discount on OPD Consultations (Our Network of Hospitals PAN India)
• Discount on Lab Tests• Discount on Radiology Test (MRI, CT Scan)
• 2nd Medical Opinion

docOPD Health Plans are carefully crafted to help any family to save on out of the pocket medical expenses which are generally not covered under medical insurance.

How OPD Plans Benefits You
docOPD Health Plans offer you great comfort to consult a doctor on phone, even if you are healthy, for health tips and preventive advice, without paying any additional consultation fees. Based upon extensive user's feedback, study, and research, docOPD application helps you to know which doctor you need to consult based on your age, gender, BMI, and other vitals.

· Great convenience
· Hassle-free online payment
· Value for money
· Services at home
· Better Health      
o Reducing the risk of getting sick 
o Timely detect potentially life-threatening diseases 
o Timely initiation of treatment
o Monitoring of existing conditions

Laboratory Tests at Home
Avail 30% Discount on Lab Tests & Health Packages from Top Labs & Free Health Assessment to avoid future health risks.

Diagnostic Tests & Health Test Packages - Full Body Health Check-Up, Blood Test, Cholesterol Test, Lipid Profile Test, Liver Function Test, Kidney Function Test, Blood Sugar Test for Diabetes, HbA1c Test, PSA Test, Thyroid Test, Haemoglobin Test, Vitamin Test, Iron Test, Allergy Test, Many more...

On booking of any Lab Test, a trained blood collection executive visits the patient home to collect samples.

Health Test booking process
• Book & Pay for Health Test/Packages from the mobile app.
• A trained blood collection executive visits home to collect samples.
• e- Report is sent via Email/Mobile App.
• Doctor Consultation

Radiology Test
docOPD has a wide network of 30% discounted partners PAN India for any type of radiology test such as X-Ray, Echo, TMT, CT Scan, MRI, PET CT, Ultrasound, Mammography, etc

Second Medical Opinion
docOPD offers its users reconfirmation of the line of treatment from the industry’s best doctors and surgeons in order to have the right diagnosis and the best treatment. Before planning for any medical procedure, get the second opinion for a medical expert to ensure the right line of treatment.

Disclaimer
All information, content, and material of this mobile app is for informational purposes only and are not intended to serve as a substitute for the Consultation, Diagnosis, and/or Medical Treatment of a qualified Medical Practitioner.

For Privacy Policy, visit: https://www.docopd.com/privacy-policy
For Terms of Use, visit: https://www.docopd.com/terms-of-service
